id.description: ID of the record you are acting upon.

raw.description: Include raw response. Mostly used for debugging purposes

x-apideck-consumer-id.description: ID of the consumer which you want to get or push data from

x-apideck-app-id.description: The ID of your Unify application

x-apideck-service-id.description: Provide the service id you want to call (e.g., pipedrive). Only needed when a consumer has activated multiple integrations for a Unified API.

fields.description:
The 'fields' parameter allows API users to specify the fields they want to include in the API response. If this parameter is not present, the API will return all available fields. If this parameter is present, only the fields specified in the comma-separated string will be included in the response. Nested properties can also be requested by using a dot notation.

Example: `fields=name,email,addresses.city`

In the example above, the response will only include the fields "name", "email" and "addresses.city". If any other fields are available, they will be excluded.

$ul: **data**
**abn_branch**: An ABN Branch (also known as a GST Branch) is used if part of your business needs to account for GST separately from its parent entity.
**abn_or_tfn**: An ABN is necessary for operating a business, while a TFN (Tax File Number) is required for any person working in Australia.

**acn**: The Australian Company Number (ACN) is a nine digit number with the last digit being a check digit calculated using a modified modulus 10 calculation. ASIC has adopted a convention of always printing and displaying the ACN in the format XXX XXX XXX; three blocks of three characters, each block separated by a blank.
**addresses**
**annual_revenue**: The annual revenue of the company
**bank_accounts**
**birthday**: The date of birth of the person.
**created_at**: Creation date
**created_by**: Created by user ID
**currency**: Indicates the associated currency for an amount of money. Values correspond to [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217).
**custom_fields**
**custom_mappings**: When custom mappings are configured on the resource, the result is included here.
**deleted**: Whether the company is deleted or not
**description**: A description of the company
**emails**
**fax**: The fax number of the company
**first_name**: The first name of the person.
**id**: Unique identifier for the company
**image**: The Image URL of the company
**industry**: The industry represents the type of business the company is in.
**interaction_count**: Number of interactions
**last_activity_at**: Last activity date
**last_name**: The last name of the person.
**name**: Name of the company
**number_of_employees**: Number of employees
**owner_id**: Owner ID
**ownership**: The ownership indicates the type of ownership of the company.
**parent_id**: Parent ID
**payee_number**: A payee number is a unique number that identifies a payee for tax purposes.
**phone_numbers**
**read_only**: Whether the company is read-only or not
**row_type**
**name**
**sales_tax_number**: A sales tax number is a unique number that identifies a company for tax purposes.
**salutation**: A formal salutation for the person. For example, 'Mr', 'Mrs'
**social_links**
**status**: The status of the company
**tags**
**updated_at**: Last updated date
**updated_by**: Updated by user ID
**vat_number**: The VAT number of the company
**websites**
**operation**: Operation performed
**resource**: Unified API resource name
**service**: Apideck ID of service provider
